tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: [HD] [FUNNY] PSY - "HONGDAE STYLE" (GANGNAM STYLE) MV PARODY BY TREND FACTORY
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: | PITCH CHANGED TO AVOID BEING BLOCKED BY YG ENTERTAINMENT | | HD | BETTER QUALITY | TREND FACTORY MV PARODY Gangnam Style (강남 스타일) PSY (싸이) - THIS VIDEO IS NOT INTENDED FOR COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT - I DO NOT OWN ANYTHING - THIS VIDEO IS FAIR USE UNDER THE US COPYRIGHT LAW BECAUSE IT IS (1) NONCOMMERCIAL (2) TRANSFORMATIVE IN NATURE, AND (3) DOES NOT COMPETE ORIGINAL WORK OR HAVE ANY NEGATIVE EFFECT ON ITS MARKET. - FOUND ON www.nate.com - AUDIOVISUAL RIGHTS ARE GIVEN TO YG. ENTERTAINMENT - I AM NOT PART OF THE GROUP - THIS VIDEO IS OWNED BY THE TREND FACTORY

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: The guy at 1:54 looked like a Korean homeless Gandalf with that staff. Way﻿ better than the original.
no one is better than the original...﻿
It's not Funny. Don't put the "Funny". It's like a﻿ Music Video of Hongdae. There's no comparison to Gangnam Style.
não e o original mas ficou legal as gravações e﻿ engraçado tambem =)
Where do i﻿ get one of those awesome horse hats?
A parody of﻿ a video that's already a parody? Maybe that's why this isn't that interesting.
the led sunglasses is so cool﻿ where can buy it?
man it would have been﻿ perfect if the guy had some meat and there were more ppl!
i like the﻿ girl in the beginning, thats it
The Girl Who Play The Part Of Hyuna Looks Like﻿ SNSD Tiffany
1:37 exactly how i feel about﻿ that ass
